title: Bolivia
summary: Bolivia[lower-alpha 1] /bəˈlɪviə/ (listen), officially the Plurinational State of Bolivia,[lower-alpha 2][9][10] is a landlocked country located in western-central South America. The constitutional capital is Sucre, while the seat of government and executive capital is La Paz. The largest city and principal industrial center is Santa Cruz de la Sierra, located on the Llanos Orientales (tropical lowlands), a mostly flat region in the east of the country.
